summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; authorizing the construction of Longfellow Creek-Unit \#1, Contract 2-A, storm drain in the vicinity of vacated 26th Avenue Southwest from Southwest Spokane Street to Southwest Andover Street, in connection with the separation of combined sewers in the Delridge Valley, making a reappropriation from the Sewer Improvement Fund of funds previously appropriated by Ordinance 103316 for such construction, and superseding said Ordinance 103316 which contained an incorrect designation of contract boundaries.
